price: 22. iyagoo leh: Ku kallaha beertiinna haddaad goosanaysaan midhaha.
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
